name: L Mike Douglas
text: Almost $12.00 for cheese sticks. Worst cheese sticks I ever had. I said no powdered cheese .She said they don't put powdered cheese on anything .there was no cheese and all it was is bread and powdered cheese or garlic powder.  My dog ate it all but two sticks.  Spite or mistake ?.     Won't buy again.
